versions.notes: Supported on ChromeOS, macOS, and Windows. Supported on Linux (Intel Gen12+ GPUs only) since Chrome 144. Available on all adapters and enabled automatically on all devices even if not requested.

Supports all contexts except service workers. See bug 1942431. Supports Windows since Firefox 141. See bug 1972486. Supports macOS Tahoe on Apple silicon since Firefox 145. See bug 1992212. Supports older macOS versions on Apple silicon since Firefox 147. See bug 1993341. Does not support macOS on Intel CPUs. See bug 2004105. Does not support Linux. See bug 2006676.
Supported on ChromeOS, macOS, and Windows. Supported on Linux (Intel Gen12+ GPUs only) since Edge 144. Available on all adapters and enabled automatically on all devices even if not requested.
Supported on ChromeOS, macOS, and Windows. Supported on Linux (Intel Gen12+ GPUs only) since Opera false. Available on all adapters and enabled automatically on all devices even if not requested.
Supported on ChromeOS, macOS, and Windows. Supported on Linux (Intel Gen12+ GPUs only) since Edge 144. Available on all adapters and enabled automatically on all devices even if not requested.

Supported on ChromeOS, macOS, and Windows. Supported on Linux (Intel Gen12+ GPUs only) since Chrome 144. Available on all adapters and enabled automatically on all devices even if not requested.

Supports all contexts except service workers. See bug 1942431. Supports Windows since Firefox 141. See bug 1972486. Supports macOS Tahoe on Apple silicon since Firefox 145. See bug 1992212. Supports older macOS versions on Apple silicon since Firefox 147. See bug 1993341. Does not support macOS on Intel CPUs. See bug 2004105. Does not support Linux. See bug 2006676.
